name: Death To Wizards
description:
Fight as a Knight and get your revenge on Wizards which turned your whole Knight Order into Zombies. Defeat big Wizard Boss and Finish the Game!

Game was made during GMTK Gamejam 2021

Game refers theme of the Game Jam "Joined Together". I experimented a little bit with this idea. Powerful connection between enemies makes them harder to overcome. Certain game mechanics require linking several actions to achieve result. 

I got my inspiration from games like Diablo 2 and Arch Vale.

Style: dungeon-crawler, roguelike, hack and slash.

I hope you will like it. Feel free to comment your experience with my game!

How to play

For movement use keyboard WSAD keys

For aiming and attacking use the mouse

Tips

Kill Wizards First. Possessed Zombies are immortal

Kill all enemies in the area and make shrines lit up in the same time to open the doors to next level

Lit up Shrines slow down zombies

Use melee knockback on immortal zombies to push them away from you or into lit up shrines
